text: @NYGovCuomo Thank you for all of your Leadership. The Nation hungers for it. You have been given  the gift of Leadership- keep using it for  our sake.. My daughters friend in California. Had his Dad die there. InCleveland he lost 4 siblings. The pain must be unbearable.all Covid-19 .
